title: Welcome to my Blog!
content: Here is where I will be posting my Developer Logs for all my personal projects moving foward.

title: [3/27/2025] Update on Effectiveness Dex
content: The search feature has been fully implemented! When you search for a Pokémon the results that show up are the types that the Pokémon do double damage against when using Same Type Attack Boost (STAB) moves. Next step would be to make each type card clickable and display pages for each type that show a list of Pokémon of each type.

title: [4/1/2025] Another Update on Effectiveness Dex
content:
Another update!

Now when the user clicks on the different types in the search results, the page redirects to a list of Pokémon of that particular type.

I have two more feature updates left to implement before I do any final designing.

title: [5/19/2025] Effectiveness Dex - May Update
content: Effectiveness Dex is officially on hiatus due to my enrollment into a Medical Billing and Coding online course last month. I hope to pick this up again soon!

title: New Projects!
content: Hey all, been a while. I am no longer continuing work on Effectiveness Dex, however I have picked up two new projects after trying to find the time between interviews and my online course! More information can be found on my GitHub.
